channel.title: Meetups on Anshul Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Meetups on Anshul Patel

item.title: Opensource identity and access management with Keycloak
item.description: My meetup talk provides introduction to keycloak and how it can be leveraged for identity and access management.

item.title: Safeguard Software Supply Chain
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about safeguarding the software supply chain via SLSA framework and SBOM.

item.title: Chaos Engineering with Litmus Chaos Framework
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about conducting Chaos Engineering experiments using Litmus Chaos Framework.

item.title: Chaos Engineering with Gremlin Platform
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about conducting Chaos Engineering experiments using Gremlin platform.

item.title: Chaos Engineering with Chaos Lambda
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about basics of Chaos Engineering and how to induce Chaos Engineering via Chaos Lambda.

item.title: Docker Notary
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about securely distributing docker images in Software Supply Chain using Docker Notary.

item.title: Building CLI applications with Golang
item.description: My lightening talk discusses on structure, architecture, framework and workflow of developing Command Line Interface (CLI) applications using Golang.

item.title: LinuxKit
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about how to build immutable operating systems [Unikernels] with LinuxKit.

item.title: Apache Zookeeper
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about the architecture, configuration, scalability and management of Apache Zookeeper.

item.title: Container Cluster Management with AWS ECS
item.description: My meetup talk discusses about basics of Docker containers and how to orchestrate the containers at scale using AWS ECS.
